NZTides

Based on official LINZ tide predictions so should be accurate. Other transcription errors are possible but hopefully unlikely. This program shouldn't be used where life or property might be at risk. No Warranty.

Released under the GPLv3. See https://github.com/jevonlongdell/nztides for source code. Program copyright Jevon Longdell, tide data presumably under Crown Copyright, which is generally very permissive, see http://www.linz.govt.nz/linz-copyright.
Persistent notifications showing upcoming tide times

Problem reading tide data. Try selecting the port again, sometimes the ports available change with an upgrade. If this doesn\'t work it is either because the tide data is out of date or you\'ve found some bug, try looking for an update.
The first tide in this datafile doesn\'t occur until %s. The app should start working properly about then.
